column5: Morning All  Just wanted to give a shout out to RyanMc for the amazing pieces of furniture that I picked up on the weekend I could not be a happier guy. A little bit of loving and its good to go I know you had it for a long time sorry you couldnt use it  I feel like I robbed you but I promise that I will have it until they bury me in it. It will be well taken care of. My better half is very happy  Cheers Peter  P.S. thanks to all that make this site run I know its a big job and I appreciate it every day    first order of bus lemon oil  so it begins  almost there  Mister Clean would be proud
Always nice when a sale goes well Pete
ahh so it was you that picked it up LOL.  i was 'told' to jump on it but noticed the ad was gone  be quick or be dead as they say.  looks great.
only 5 mins ahead of someone else
Looks great !!!! Nice work, Glad it went to a good home. R
Yep Ryans a super nice guy. Never over prices.
Again THANKS!!!!! it was a pleasure
